title: Did Mama Cass’ Vocal Range Expand After She Was Hit on the Head by a Pipe?
subtitle: Singer Cass Elliot reportedly experienced a three-note increase in her vocal range after suffering a head injury in the Virgin Islands.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Singer "Mama" Cass Elliot experienced an increase in her vocal range after she was hit in the head by a pipe.
